common.introduce: Library built by FSofter, for FSofter
common.libraryAddress: F-Ville 3, FPT Software Hoa Lac, Hoa Lac Hi-Tech Park, Thach That District, Hanoi, Vietnam

afk.title: Standby mode
afk.description:
Switched to standby mode to reduce unnecessary data transmission.
Are you there? It's been more than {{afkTime}} minutes with no action detected!
afk.hint: Hover over this site to reconnect.

common.dragImage: Drag a image here or click to select it from your device
common.dragFile: Drag a file here or click to select it from your device
common.name: Name
common.label: Label
common.title: Title

fetching.title: Fetching...
fetching.message: The system is synthesizing and retrieving data.

communication.cancelRequest: Operation canceled due to new request.

info.pagingOutRange: Your page number request has no data, showing the first page.

banned.title: Your account has been banned
banned.message: To proceed, kindly get in touch with the librarian for assistance

invalidQR.title: QR code invalid
invalidQR.message: Data for this QR code may no longer be available

sthWrong.action: Something went wrong. Please try again later!

serverError.limit_borrow: You can only borrow a maximum of {{count}} books
serverError.been_pre_ordered: The book {{name}} has been borrowed by someone else

notFound.title: Page not found!
notFound.description: The page you are trying to open does not exist. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL. If you think this is an error, please get in touch with us.

auth.toSignUp: Not a member? Create an account

validation.password: Password must contain at least 8 characters

denied.title: Permission Denied
denied.description:
You do not have permission to access this page. 
If you believe this is an error, please contact us.

policy.sentence: By clicking Sign Up, you are setting up an account and agree to our <PolicyComponent>{{policy}}</PolicyComponent>.

import.takeTime:
The data import process operates in the background, and it may take some time to complete.
You can close this modal and attend to some other task.

error.process: There seems to be an error while processing the data. Please check the file and try again.

confirm.cancel: Please confirm whether you want to cancel your order for this book
confirm.return: Are you sure you want to return this book?
confirm.remove: Are you sure you want to remove this book?

existed.title: Books already exist
existed.rent: The book has already been selected

noData.genre: There are no books available in this category at the moment
noData.homeEmpty: New books are being added to the library

renewMembership.noMembership: You can still access the Cudek library information and browse the list of books without an active membership.
renewMembership.guide: Please contact the librarian to check if your account has not been renewed within one business day.

confirm.ban: Are you sure you want to ban this user?
confirm.unban: Are you sure you want to active this account?
confirm.promote: Confirm administrator privileges for this account?
confirm.demote: Are you certain you want to revoke the administrator privileges from this account?

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.signUp: By Signing in with Google, you are setting up a Cudek account and agree to our $t(terms.title)
terms.beforeContinue: Please confirm that you agree to the terms below before proceeding with account creation
terms.membership: To borrow books, you need to activate and pay for library membership after registration
terms.googleAccount: $t(terms.signUp). You also consent to share your email address, name, and profile picture with us.
terms.readMoreGoogleInfoShare: Learn what data is shared when you use Sign in with Google

bookStatus.confirm: Please confirm the change in the book's status.
bookStatus.actionUnavailable: There are no actions available for the current book status.
